bio: 16+ yrs experience as a Market Maker/ Arbitrageur/ Quantitative & Implied volatility trader/ Hedger/ Delta Greeks in Options & Perpetuals...
contributionDescription:
Onboarded (Bridged) 118 High Networth Individuals (HNI's) from stock markets on to Optimism network for the first time live in South Africa (Proof of Bridging: https://optimistic.etherscan.io/batches?ps=100&p=8544). 

We conducted live workshop for bridging to OP, wherein out of 186 users, 118 onboarded directly to Optimism since all were asked beforehand to carry laptop or mobile wallet. This brought 118 new high net worth quality users to Optimism. Pictures of the meetup participants as well the bridging transaction link attached for reference as proof. 

Attaching: 1.) Detailed summary of the Meetup 2.) Images of Meetup. 3.) Transaction link as proof of bridging.

contributionLinks.description: Proof of bridging txns to OP Mainnet by our 118 HNI users during our meetup

impactDescription:
1.) We bridged 118 high networth individuals from stock markets to Optimism mainnet. Proof of bridging transaction link is attached for reference.
2.) These traders & investors are still active even in this bear market which is evident from their unique wallet activities.
3.) We created a mini ecosystem for Optimism here at South Africa.

fundingSources.description: We received nothing. We even enquired in OP discord but no response.
